DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate lip fullness 3 month follow treatment Juvéderm® Volbella Lidocaine Restylane-L®
DOC.brief_title: Safety Effectiveness Juvéderm® Volbella With Lidocaine Versus Restylane-L® Lip Volume Enhancement
DOC.criteria: 1 . Desire enhancement his/her vermilion border and/or vermilion mucosa 2 . Have baseline score Minimal Mild , assess Investigator , accord 5point LFS ( Minimal , Mild , Moderate , Marked , Very Marked ) 3 . Have establish realistic Lip Fullness treatment goal Investigator agree achievable 1 . Have undergone cosmetic facial , lip perioral procedure [ e.g. , facelift , surgery , may alter appearance lip perioral area ( laser , photomodulation , intense pulse light , radio frequency , dermabrasion , moderate great depth chemical peel , ablative procedure ) , tissue augmentation dermal filler fat injection , mesotherapy ] anywhere face neck , Botox® Cosmetic injection low face ( orbital rim ) , within 6 month prior entry study planning undergo procedure time study . NOTE : Prior treatment HA filler and/or collagen allow , provide treatment administer 6 month prior study entry 2 . Have ever receive semipermanent filler permanent facial implant , e.g. , calcium hydroxyapatite , Lpolylactic acid , polymethylmethacrylate ( PMMA ) , silicone , expand polytetrafluoroethylene ( ePTFE ) anywhere lips , plan implant product time study
